heisigStory: This character represents a picture of an ax, the two vertical lines being the handle and the horizontal strokes of the blade. Note the writing order carefully.
koohiiStory1: Errata: stroke order in 4th edition is wrong. Top stroke is first.
koohiiStory2: The axe-wielding maniac nails a poor victim, right under a cliff. Blood everywhere! (thanks scottamus!).
